General.Name: Navinfo Co Ltd
General.Description: NavInfo Co., Ltd. provides smart mobility solutions in China and internationally. The company provides map navigation, navigation software development, dynamic traffic information, location big data, and customized connected vehicle services for passenger and commercial vehicles. It offers navigation services, such as digital map and map compilation; connected vehicle services including passenger and commercial vehicles; HD map and HD-GNSS autonomous driving; and automotive chipsets. The company also provides new energy vehicle and mobile measuring solutions. NavInfo Co., Ltd. was founded in 2002 and is based in Beijing, China.
